name: Fields of Spring
description:
Turning 18 is a milestone for anyone, and for Mikey, it means he's not just headed toward adulthood... he's already there!
His mediocre soccer team's scheduled for an exhibition match with the preppy high school across town. Do they even stand a chance? Navigating life as an adult and relearning teamwork has never been more tiresome. To top it all off, he's still got all the normal problems of grades, friends, bullies, school dances, and girls…

What the hell went wrong?

Fields of Spring is a kinetic visual novel (no choices) and is an adult fiction that features themes and scenarios that may not be suitable for all ages. Please be aware, and do not read if you are not over the age of 18.

Credits:

Direction, Script, Music - Eymon

Sprites, Backgrounds, Illustrations - Coffyeen

UI Design - Syktur

Editing, Proofreading, Consultant - Shiroooo

Editing, Proofreading, General Assistance - arSyx

Programming, Technical Assistance - Blabel
